textFR:
`Texte de la carte
${n} : nombre de gorgées
${p} : player`
textEN: #Anglais
If you're single take ${n} sips, taken take ${n+1} sips,if it's complicated take ${2*n}
Take ${n} sips if you'd rather have a cat than a dog
The older to have installed instagram takes  ${n} sips
Francis Cabrel's songs", the first to not know or repeat takes ${n} sips
${p} and ${p2} read the last text that shows up when you write "horny" in your search bar. Deny for ${n} sips
${p} choose something you don't like. Those who like this take ${n} sips, if no one drink you have to drink these
